channel.title: Nikkei Sindex 2
channel.itunes:subtitle: Tokyo Punk Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Eric Ottens, Jordon Cheung
channel.itunes:summary: From the heart of Eastern Sin into your budded ears -- the best and baddest of Tokyo punk. Interviews, live clips, very attractive hosts.
channel.description: From the heart of Eastern Sin into your budded ears -- the best and baddest of Tokyo punk. Interviews, live clips, very attractive hosts.

item.title: The Climax, nanoX, The Slowmotions
item.description: Dodging robot dogs and porno vending machines we managed to get to a couple shows, record some songs, and talk to the bands. This week it's The Climax, nanoX, and The Slowmotions. YOU LISTEN NOW.
item.itunes:author: Eric Ottens, Jordon Cheung
item.itunes:subtitle: We went to these shows, talked to these bands
item.itunes:summary: Dodging robot dogs and porno vending machines we managed to get to a couple shows, record some songs, and talk to the bands. This week it's The Climax, nanoX, and The Slowmotions. YOU LISTEN NOW.
item.itunes:keywords: tokyo, punk, nikkei sindex, nikkeisindex, climax, billy-o, nanoX, Slowmotions

item.title: Haruto and the Daddy Longfeet
item.description: We enjoyed the Daddy Longfeet live, in the studio and had a chat with charming bass player Haruto. Oi!
item.itunes:author: Eric Ottens, Jordon Cheung
item.itunes:subtitle: The Daddy Longfeet! Live, in the studio, and interview with Haruto (bass)
item.itunes:summary: We enjoyed the Daddy Longfeet live, in the studio and had a chat with charming bass player Haruto. Oi!
item.itunes:keywords: tokyo, punk, nikkei sindex, nikkeisindex, Daddy Longfeet, Haruto, ska, Oi!
